title: phaseSpec~
description: The `phaseSpec~` object calculates and outputs the phase spectrum of an audio signal. It performs a Fourier transform and extracts the phase (angle) information for each frequency bin, outputting a list of values between -pi and +pi radians when triggered by a bang. This object is useful for analyzing the phase characteristics of sounds, which can be influenced by windowing functions, and can be used as a feature for timbre classification.
